评论详情: Really cute, doesn't wrinkle, and the color pops!

评论概述: Adorable Dress with a Few Things to Note
评论详情: This dress is super cute, and the fabric is lovely—I took my senior pictures in it and loved how it looked! The material is light and airy but double-lined, which is fantastic for coverage. However, at 6ft tall, this dress is very short on me, so I have to be a bit cautious when wearing it. One detail I didn’t expect is the front tie with a keyhole opening. I usually prefer more modest styles, but I found a way to adjust it to make it work for me. Overall, it’s a beautiful dress, and despite its quirks, I’m really happy with it!
It came ripped and missing the tag

评论概述: Not as pictured but still cute
评论详情: The color matches. Fit is flattering for the mid section.  The top seems a little off. The V/ the part of the dress where it ties is not like it appears in the picture. It is not as low/deep as it appears in the picture.  I'm a 38D and the girls fit in there just fine. I was hoping the V was sexier, but it's still cute. Also being 5'9" it is not too short! Sleeves are a little uncomfortable,  but the rest of the dress is comfortable!

I've worn this to multiple weddings now lol. Its a lovely color, comfortable fit, and it gets a lot of compliments! It's elegant enough for the wedding, but not too overdone like you're trying to outshine the bride 😎✨️ It is pretty lowcut in the front and I got no boobage to fill it 😂 so if you're like me get a nice matching lacy bralette and some long body jewelry to fill the space

This dress fit perfectly!!! I’m usually an XL and this was a perfect true to size comfort! Wish I would have gotten a L though so it could be a bit more fitted and shorter in length but it was perfect!
Fit is true to size, work appropriate length and very comfortable. The bow tie is adorable..if planning to wear for work, might need to get creative with the tie or just wear a bandeau underneath.

I hate dresses but found this one and loved it! I received so many compliments the night I wore it. I decided to write a review for a mini warning. This is not exactly big bust friendly if you like to be a little modest! I bought a white tank top to wear under or else a majority of the front of my bra was showing. Other than that I loved it

评论概述: Color of actual dress different than photo
评论详情: I ordered the powder blue with the light tan flowers. I got a powdered blue dress with dark rust colored flowered. I thought it was maybe the screen showing a different color but after looking through the customer photos it looks like it’s just the luck of the draw because some have light tan flowers and others have the rust color. I wasn’t a fan of the rust color flowers so I returned and ordered the black which I love. I’m usually a M or L and after trying on the powder blue it looked kind of baggy in the shoulder area and the dress has great stretch so I ended up getting the small in black which fits great! I gave it 3 stars because I do love the black dress. Took off two for inaccurate photo and hassle of having to returning item because of that.

Some clothes seem to look and feel like an extension of your soul.  This dress is one of those!  I am thrilled with the quality and fit of this purchase!  I’ve only worn it twice and have gotten sooo many compliments.
This dress is amazing!! True to size. Beautiful color.

评论用户: I washed this dress one time and the seam is coming apart and it is literally falling apart. I bought this dress for a cruise, brought it home and washed it and now it is ruined. One wear! Are you kidding me????

So overall the dress could've been decent. I loved the color (the pictures where it looks pink aren't doing it justice, it’s truly a light lavender color). It seemed like a cute dress even if it felt like cheaper fabric. It didn't seem see-through either. I returned it because of the makeup stains already on it & wasn't interested in trying it again.

I wore this dress at a wedding and it was super comfortable! The material was soft and not too see through when you bend down. It functions perfectly and hugs all the right places. I'm plus size and this dress is sk comfortable and flattering

评论概述: Best dress I've ordered off of Amazon.
评论详情: I got the dress in black and i absolutely love it. Other reviews say the fabric is see through but I didn't have that problem in this color unless I held it up in the light. No problem when wearing it. You can adjust the front straps and bow to make it versatile for different events. More modest when pulled looser with a bra, and the opposite when pulled tightly with a smaller tied bow. The length was perfect for me, for reference I am 300lbs and 5'11 and I ordered a 2x.
This dress is fantastic, it fit beautifully and was comfortable all night. The material is soft and flows nicely. I would definitely recommend this dress.

I was very on the fence when I ordered this dress because it’s more “risqué” than something I would typically wear. I’ve had 2 babies so I have a bit of a mom pouch and tend to buy things more covering that hide my body but when I tried this on it brought back all of my confidence. It’s a tad shorter than I would like but honestly I think I’m just not used to it. The fabric quality feels legit, it’s not that paper thin see through material, it has a good slip! It hugs my body in all the right places and I honestly couldn’t be any happier!
I love it! Fits great on most body types and is super cute! Hides unwanted areas and is tight/loose in the right places

I bought this for a last minute fairy costume lol. But I'm definitely going to be wearing it all the time and buying more colors. For reference I'm 5'3 and 195 pounds. The only thing is if you have a smaller chest it might not fit very well on the tie area. But other than that it fits me perfectly and very flattering. It's super stretchy but you will probably have to wear something underneath because the cut is pretty revealing. The meterial is very nice. Super flowy and comfortable

I love this dress!  The length is perfect for me 5’2” and hits me right above knee.  Dress is very flattering hiding imperfections and I love the bright vibrant colors.  I wore it to a bridal shower and can’t wait for another opportunity to wear it.  Quality is very good, soft, comfortable and love the flowy skirt.
Just as pictured. The arms are a little short, a common issue for me. The red does say “red” but looks more maroon online. It’s red. Like Christmas red.
Absolutely beautiful Well made
My full figured Ladies, get this dress! It’s perfection! I’ve got a second one on its way in blue. I’d love to buy all colors but haha I have to refrain. Love. Love. Love. Love this dress!!
This really ties at your chest area, so there is a bit of a spot of skin showing on under your chest. Soo. A little revealing

Wore the dress to a birthday party. Grey & white attire. Dress is light weight, it's not see through. Only the sleeves. Has a peek a boo opening below the breast. Most of it was covered when I tied together. Need a good bra so it wont show through the opening. Covers up the belly imperfections and comfortable, breathable for lots of dancing. Nice dress

I love this dress its fabulous I’m buying another one !

This dress was very comfortable. Double layered, with beautiful bold colors. Bought for a 60's themed birthday party and it worked well. It would work for many other type of events as well. Beautiful dress! Excellent quality. Not see through at all. Super comfortable and just the right length. It’s exactly as pictured. I am not disappointed with this dress. The price is great for the quality.
Comfy, just the right length. 5’7” 190lbs ordered a Large

评论概述: super cute but cut out placement is hard to hide
评论详情: love this dress.  it is super cute but if you have a large chest the cut out placement is very difficult to cover so your bra isn't showing.  wish the cut out was not there or at least smaller so when you tied it you could be confident that your bra wont show.  the length is perfect my only other complaint would be poor stitching on the ties.  after only wearing it twice the stitching is coming undone at where the tie meets the dress.  this could be from me pulling so much to tie the front part tight enough to prevent me from flashing people.

Used it for a wedding i originally ordered an XL but seemed a little to big so I ordered a L to compare and kept the L it seemed more flattering and a little smaller on the chest area so it was perfect for reference i am 5’3 waist 36” 175 lbs it has some stretch around the waist

I hesitated on purchasing this dress because I haven’t had success lately with the material for a lot of dresses I’ve been purchasing. However, I went through all of the reviews, thoroughly and distressed, did not disappoint! Although the recommended size for me was a large, I decided to go with the medium, and I’m glad I did because the cut on the back of the dress fit me better with the medium, although the length of the large would have been more appropriate. I’m keeping the medium and absolutely look forward to wearing it on my upcoming cruise! Note:it stops above my knee 2-3 inches. Height 5’ 8” Weight: 171 lbs
The color was way off I understand a little different from the picture but this one I got was more blue than green 💚

I love this outfit. It's lightweight and very colorful. Length is about 3" above the knees. I'm 5'4", 130Lbs, 38-D. I normally wear a medium, but it was too big. I returned it for a small and it fits perfect.
Loved it! Got many compliments. True to size, above the knees. I ordered a med. I’m 5’3, 145 pound.
Super cute!!
I absolutely love everything about this dress! It’s so cute and I got lots of compliments. Well made and it did not came stinky like other reviews said. Very pleased.
Dress fit as expected. Very comfy. Great quality

I really wanted to keep this dress, but it is extremely revealing with the neckline.  I do have a large bust and it would be better on a B or C cup.  I even put a cami underneath but it looked funny.  I tried different bras but it was a no go.  The material and color of the dress is gorgeous and it is super cute.  It is an adorable dress otherwise.
I was pleasantly surprised at this dress . Looks great on . I sized up to a large and it's perfect .

Not going to lie... it's not as short as I was expecting it to be and I really wanted to be a little bit shorter for a night out... but that's okay ...it was perfect for a wedding I wore to. It's not transparent ...and it has a very nice lining!
I love this dress. It’s comfy chic! I plan on ordering more colors.

It fit just right, I was really worried about the chest area but it worked out pretty well with a nice red bra you couldn’t really notice the bra. The length was great and it works great for a daytime or nighttime event.

Very flattering and exactly as described. Very cute! Tempted to purchase one in every color.

I bought this dress for an upcoming wedding in Long Beach, California, where it's sure to be hot outside. It arrived the next day, and I'm thrilled with it! The material is beautiful and fresh, perfect for a casual yet elegant look. I chose the large size, and it fit me perfectly. I love it so much that I plan to buy more colors. Highly recommended!

I purchased this dress for a bachelorette party that was “pink disco” theme. It was so comfortable, cute, and perfect for the occasion. I loved how the front can be adjusted/tied to your liking. It is a great quality dress that I hope to wear again!

The fabric flows nicely, it’s comfortable. The material is not stretchy, but the elastic waist makes it easy to get on and off. The material is thin but not too sheer, and the quality was worth the cost. I wore it on a 70 degree day on a date and it was perfect!

Such a cute summer dress! I can usually fit between a small and a medium and I decided to go with a small especially being on the smaller chested side, it fit perfectly. The length is great and the quality feels really nice, the elastic cinch in the waist was a nice touch, can’t wait to wear!

Cures sexy And modest . Where it ties in front , you can see a little skin under the breast . Easily can be covered by a tank top if you are more modest like me … I ordered two , I liked them so much .

The colors were lovely! I juts had a hard time covering the front area. You can not wear a bra with it. Due to peep hole at the bottom of the tie. I received nothing but compliments!

I needed a cheap outfit for a country concert. I was concerned when I opened the package and noticed how deep the V was cut in the bust. I’m an hourglass, curvy petite figure, with DD-DDD girls.. I had to use lots of tape to make this work. After taping and tying the front, It turned out very cute! This was size XL and is true to size. It was comfy the whole night and I didn’t have issues with wrinkles! The dress has a sheer  top layer of fabric but it has a slip so it wasn’t see through. I was happy with my purchase, and will wear it again!
